tr.name: Thorne
tr.appearance: Tall and muscular with bark-like skin
tr.clothing: Armor made of interwoven vines and leaves

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the heart of the tempest, ancient magic stirred.
json_to_edit.description: A sudden storm awakens Elara's dormant powers, attracting the attention of elemental spirits.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Howling wind, cracking thunder, rustling leaves
json_to_edit.name: Awakening Storm
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Elara's latent magical abilities are awakened during an unexpected storm, drawing the attention of Zephyr and Thorne.

qa.action: A massive storm cloud gathers over an ancient forest, lightning illuminating the sky.

hf.action: Elara's cottage in a clearing, surrounded by swaying trees as the storm intensifies.

tr.action: Elara tosses in her bed, her silver hair starting to glow faintly as lightning flashes outside.

xc.action: Elara's eyes snap open, glowing with an otherworldly light as she sits up abruptly.

ka.action: Zephyr materializes in the room, his misty form swirling as he approaches Elara.

fn.action: Thorne bursts through the cottage floor, positioning himself protectively near Elara as she stares in wonder at her glowing hands.

edit_command: Remove the second and fifth shots from the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: In the heart of the tempest, ancient magic stirred.
updated_json.description: A sudden storm awakens Elara's dormant powers, attracting the attention of elemental spirits.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Howling wind, cracking thunder, rustling leaves

tr.action: Elara tosses in her bed, her silver hair starting to glow faintly as lightning flashes outside.

label.rationale: we need to remove the second and fifth shots from the scene as requested by the edit command. this involves updating the "shots" section of the json, specifically the "list_display_order" and removing the corresponding shot entries. the second shot has the key "hf" and the fifth shot has the key "ka". we'll remove these from the list_display_order and delete their entries from the shots dictionary. this will reduce the total number of shots from 6 to 4, so we'll also update the "number_of_shots" field. the rest of the scene details will remain unchanged.
